solutionBaseLayerDesc: Xone PoS consensus provides security and finality, supporting the entire network of nodes and data storage.
solutionBaseLayerList01Desc: Best practices for decentralized staking and penalty mechanisms.
solutionBaseLayerList02Desc: Second-level confirmation/near finality, enabling financial and real-time capabilities.
solutionBaseLayerList03Desc: Tiered block and state storage, supporting snapshots and archives.
solutionExecutiveLayerDesc: EVM × Cosmos modules work in parallel, compatible with Ethereum ecosystem while offering modular governance and extensibility.
solutionExecutiveLayerList01Desc: Plug-and-play contracts, compatible with mainstream toolchains.
solutionExecutiveLayerList02Desc: Standardized accounts, assets, Gas, and Nonce.
solutionExecutiveLayerList03Desc: Cosmos modules make parameters/permissions and upgrades more lightweight.
solutionExecutiveLayerList04Desc: Proxy/multi-sig for secure upgrades and rollbacks.
solutionServiceLayerDesc: Transform underlying capabilities into services, providing cross-chain, data, compliance, and developer tools.
solutionServiceLayerList01Desc: Standard bridging protocols for bidirectional asset and message transfer.
solutionServiceLayerList03Desc: RPC and GraphQL provide high-performance read/write.
solutionServiceLayerList04Desc: Address monitoring, risk control interfaces, and evidence chains.
solutionApplicationLayerDesc: Complete entry points for users and ecosystem, covering payments, trading, identity, and analytics.
solutionApplicationLayerList01Desc: Multi-chain wallets, social login, AA experience.
solutionApplicationLayerList02Desc: SwapX trading and aggregation, buy/sell, swap, and cross-chain.
solutionApplicationLayerList03Desc: NFT trading, issuance, custody, and settlement.
solutionApplicationLayerList04Desc: Proven integration of Web3 and RWA.
solutionApplicationLayerList06Desc: A new paradigm from proposals and voting to verification and governance.
structureBuildDocDesc: Start learning how to build on Xone through our documentation and wiki.
structureBlockchainExplorerDesc: View real-time on-chain activity data including blocks, transactions, validators, accounts, and more.
structureDevelopmentToolDesc: Build DApp applications on Xone Chain faster and more efficiently.
structureResourceDesc: Get developer support from Xone to help you build foundations for interacting with the Xone ecosystem.
structureResourceList01Desc: Get free test gas fees and tokens.
structureResourceList02Desc: Comprehensive bug bounty program—security comes first.
structureResourceList03Desc: Freely submit new DApps to Xone.
structureResourceList04Desc: Continuously maintaining network security, safeguarding together with the community.
weList01Desc: Listen to our story and how we got started.
weList02Desc: Learn about our lab's vision and future direction.
weList03Desc: Verified channels, members, and all content that belongs to us.
weList04Desc: Information disclosure, global operations, and licensing.
weList05Desc: An email, a message—let us listen and help you.
globalCityAmbassadorDesc: Be the Web3 engine of your city, connecting the real world with on-chain civilization alongside Xone.
globalBusinessPromotionDesc: Learn about Xone's business connection rules and channels to grow Xone together.
globalRecruitmentDesc: Find your place at Xone with them.
globalBlogDesc: View Xone's latest updates and past stories.
globalActiveDesc: Face-to-face communication with the Xone community.
globalGrantsDesc: Inspire the innovative potential of global developers and drive ecosystem prosperity.
subscribeDesc: Xone Chain is a modular Layer 1 blockchain that goes beyond scalability and efficiency, focusing on making every on-chain action generate traceable real value.
disclaimer: As an open-architecture infrastructure, Xone blockchain allows any global team, developer, or community to freely deploy contracts and build applications without permission. This embodies the Web3 spirit of decentralization—technology neutrality, data transparency, and equal access for all. Xone official does not 'recommend,' 'guarantee,' or 'confirm cooperation' with any on-chain projects. These projects are independently developed, independently operated, and bear their own profits, losses, and risks. We advise users to always follow the principle of DYOR (Do Your Own Research) when participating in any project (especially those involving funds), exercise prudent judgment, and make rational decisions.
